ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 66
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, actually in a way it does twinking does hurt many of us. How often have you headed into that area to camp for that item you need for your character or
ygData.messageBody:
Well, actually in a way it does twinking does hurt many of us. How often have
you headed into that area to camp for that item you need for your character
or your friend who is with you only to find that guy 15 levels above anything
in the place sitting there in front of you? I think twinking is a problem
outside of just beefing up characters but in that I have heard many times
someone say I can use this for my other character this gets under my skin.
What if I can use it for the character I am playing at the moment which
happens to be the ONLY character I have. The problem comes when they camp for
items for these other characters. I am not saying everyone does it, but I
have seen it done MOORE then enough times to have a almost automatic dislike
for every twinked character I have met. I have gone in to maybe camp the
Jboots with friends and find 4 35+ lvl casters sitting there camping the
spot. All from the same guild. When they killed her in trotted one of their
lower level guildmembers to loot the corpse. This is the problem I have with
it. Twinking encourages camping and camping is already enough of a problem as
is. I could care less if his high level friend gave him all that stuff, but
if his high level friend was sitting in front of me when I was going for the
same item then it did effect me. How can you prove either way?
